name: Little Post Office For Kids
description:
The post office is a game suitable for children aged 2-5. It consists of three mini-games in which the players have to match the postage stamps on the envelope according to the pictures, collect the letters in the maze and postmark the envelopes with colorful stamps.

Prepared for the youngest the game is colourful and encouraging to play. Thanks to its functionality a child not only plays but also learns and develops the qualities of his brain such as memory, concentration, creativity and intelligence. Coming across the traffic lights a child becomes familiar with the basic traffic regulations.

The rules of the game were consulted with an experienced nursery education teacher.
